name: brabn
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cr))

stmt.origin: eqeltrd(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cr, cfv(cno, c0), wcel(c0, chba))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cfv(cno, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cno, c0), cr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(normfn `(bra ` c0))∈ ℝ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ~H →(normfn `(bra ` c0))=(normh ` c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ ~H →(normh ` c0)∈ ℝ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cfv(cno, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cno, c0), cr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(normfn `(bra ` c0))∈ ℝ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ~H →(normfn `(bra ` c0))=(normh ` c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ ~H →(normh ` c0)∈ ℝ)

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cfv(cno, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cno, c0), cr))
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cnmf, cfv(cbr, c0)), cr))

comment: The bra of a vector is a bounded functional. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
